summary: This document outlines the Aircraft Security Agreement between ThorAir, LLC and Fifth Third Bank, detailing the terms of the security interest in the aircraft, including registration, maintenance, and obligations of the borrower. It includes provisions for events of default, remedies, and the responsibilities of both parties regarding the aircraft's operation and insurance. This document outlines the Aircraft Mortgage and Security Agreement between Flight Options, LLC and FO Financing, LLC, detailing the ownership and financing of a Raytheon Aircraft Company model 400A. It includes provisions for the registration, maintenance, and operation of the aircraft, as well as the rights and obligations of the parties involved.

persons.name: Hunter McDonald
persons.context: Hunter McDonald is mentioned as the Chief Pilot for ThorAir, LLC, involved in the aircraft registration process.

persons.name: Walter Hinkley
persons.context: Walter Hinkley is referenced as the Manager of the FAA Aircraft Registry, responsible for overseeing the registration process.

persons.name: Michael Metera
persons.context: Michael Metera is mentioned as the Director of Sales Administration for Flight Options, LLC, acting as attorney-in-fact for various entities in the aircraft ownership.

persons.name: Edward T. McDonald
persons.role: VP of Whole Aircraft Sales & Acquisitions
persons.context: Edward T. McDonald is referenced as the VP of Whole Aircraft Sales & Acquisitions for Flight Options, LLC, involved in the aircraft sale and registration.

persons.name: Roderick L. Roberts
persons.context: Roderick L. Roberts is mentioned as the Vice President of The Prudential Insurance Company of America, involved in the security agreement.

persons.name: Bret Wiener
persons.context: Bret Wiener is the Vice President of FO Financing, LLC and is involved in the execution of the release of the collateral under the Mortgages.

persons.name: George H. Davis, Jr.
persons.context: George H. Davis, Jr. is listed as a trustee with a fractional interest in the aircraft.

persons.name: Dana M. Emery
persons.context: Dana M. Emery is listed as a trustee with a fractional interest in the aircraft.

connections.description: Hunter McDonald is employed as the Chief Pilot by ThorAir, LLC.
Michael Metera serves as the Director of Sales Administration for Flight Options, LLC.
Edward T. McDonald is the VP of Whole Aircraft Sales & Acquisitions at Flight Options, LLC.

connections.person2: The Prudential Insurance Company of America
connections.description: Michael Metera acts as attorney-in-fact for various entities, including The Prudential Insurance Company of America.

connections.person2: The Prudential Insurance Company of America
connections.description: Roderick L. Roberts is a Vice President at The Prudential Insurance Company of America.
Edward T. McDonald acts as Attorney-in-Fact for Flight Options, LLC in the execution of the Aircraft Mortgage and Security Agreement.
Bret Wiener is the Vice President of FO Financing, LLC, indicating an employer-employee relationship.
Both George H. Davis, Jr. and Dana M. Emery are trustees with fractional interests in the aircraft.

events.title: Execution of Aircraft Security Agreement
events.description: The Aircraft Security Agreement was executed between ThorAir, LLC and Fifth Third Bank, establishing a security interest in the aircraft.

events.title: Execution of Aircraft Mortgage and Security Agreement
events.description: The Aircraft Mortgage and Security Agreement was executed between Flight Options, LLC and FO Financing, LLC.

events.title: Transfer of Fractional Interest
events.description: A 6.25% undivided interest in the aircraft was conveyed to Flight Options, LLC from Wells Fargo Bank Northwest, N.A. - Trustee.

keyFacts: The aircraft involved is a Raytheon Aircraft Company model 400A with serial number RK-244 and registration number N493LX.
ThorAir, LLC is the owner of the aircraft, with various co-owners including Flight Options, LLC and others.
The security agreement includes provisions for maintenance, operation, and insurance of the aircraft.
The agreement outlines the events of default and the remedies available to the secured party.
The document is subject to protective orders, limiting the disclosure of certain information.
The Aircraft Mortgage and Security Agreement secures a 12.50% fractional interest in a Raytheon Aircraft Company model 400A.
Edward T. McDonald is acting as Attorney-in-Fact for Flight Options, LLC.
Bret Wiener is the Vice President of FO Financing, LLC.
George H. Davis, Jr. and Dana M. Emery are trustees with fractional interests in the aircraft.
The document includes provisions for the registration, maintenance, and operation of the aircraft.
